name: Etch
description:
A simple drawing game, Etch is available exclusively for the GameBoy Color!

Easiest way to play is by running Etch.exe. This will open the GameBoy game embedded in an emulator. 

The GameBoy game file is provided here for use in other emulators or loaded on a GBC flash card cartridge. 

To play it in your own emulator, load the etch.gb file into your emulator. 

To play it on a real Game Boy, copy the etch.gb GameBoy game file onto a GBC flash card cartridge like an EZ-Flash Jr.
